resources.string: "アラームは%1s後に消音します。"
"アラーム音量を徐々に大きくする"
"アラームはマナーモードです"
"時計で設定したアラーム用のサウンド再生サービスです。"
"アラームをスヌーズ/解除します。"
"You won't be able to receive bedtime alerts if you exit now. Exit anyway?"
Schedule bedtime reminders and track your sleep
Your stats will appear here after you start using bedtime reminders
Follow your new bedtime schedule to function at your best
Switch to DND while you sleep?
Ringtones, notification sounds, and vibration will be silenced until you wake up
When will your bedtime schedule apply?
"Select the days when you'll receive reminders"
"You'll be reminded to go to bed 15 minutes before this time"
When will you go to bed?
An alarm will go off at this
Maintaining a regular and consistent sleep schedule benefits your health. Set reminders that will help you go to bed and get up on time every day.
"あなたの誕生日に規定のアラーム音ではなく\"Happy Birthday\"を再生します"
お使いの端末にテーマアプリがインストールされていることを確認してください。
Mi AIを最新版に更新します。
Select background color for the Clock app
Black will be used as the background color every time you switch to Dark mode
\"画面を点灯したままにする\" ボタン
"選択したタイマーを削除しますか？"

<Data>"Looks like you're using holiday alarms.This feature needs to connect to the internet to work normally. Before using this feature, you must agree to our <a href=\"%1$s\">User Agreement</a> and <a href=\"%2$s\">Privacy Policy</a>. Agree?"</Data>
"Clock isn't allowed to connect to the internet to update the info about holidays. Holiday alarms will go off on Saturday and Sunday."

<Data>"Looks like you're using weekday alarms. This feature needs to connect to the internet to work normally. Before using this feature, you must agree to our <a href=\"%1$s\">User Agreement</a> and <a href=\"%2$s\">Privacy Policy</a>. Agree?"</Data>

<Data>"Looks like you're using weekday and holiday alarms. This feature needs to connect to the internet to work normally. Before using this feature, you must agree to our <a href=\"%1$s\">User Agreement</a> and <a href=\"%2$s\">Privacy Policy</a>. Agree?"</Data>
"Clock isn't allowed to connect to the internet to update the info about holidays. Weekday alarms will go off from Monday to Friday. Holiday alarms will go off on Saturday and Sunday."
"Clock isn't allowed to connect to the internet to update the info about working days. Weekday alarms will go off from Monday to Friday."
"誕生日アラームを利用するには、時計アプリが連絡先にアクセスする必要があります。同意しますか？"

<Data>This feature needs to connect to the internet to work normally. Before using this feature, you must agree to our <a href=\"%1$s\">User Agreement</a> and <a href=\"%2$s\">Privacy Policy</a>. Agree?</Data>

In order to get relevant info about local public holidays, adjust alarms, and provide personalized services, Clock needs to connect to the internet. Before using Clock, you must also read and agree to our %1$s and %2$s. Agree?
In order to provide personalized services, Clock needs to connect to the internet. Before using Clock, you must also read and agree to our %1$s and %2$s. Agree?

In order to provide personalized services and include morning news into your alarms, Clock needs to connect to the internet. Before using Clock, you must also read and agree to our %1$s and %2$s. Agree?

In order to download audio files for ambient noise timers and provide personalized services, Clock needs to connect to the internet. Before using Clock, you must also read and agree to our %1$s and %2$s. Agree?

"In order to download audio files for ambient noise timers (≈20MB) and provide personalized services, Clock needs to connect to the internet. Before using Clock, you must also read and agree to our %1$s and %2$s. You're using mobile data now. Agree?"
日付、時刻、デュアルクロックなど
タイマーを正常に終了しました
An update for public holidays is available
更新できませんでした
すべての項目が最新の状態です
"アプリを読み込めませんでした"
"タイマーの期間が無効です"
"画面を点灯したままにする"
Data expired (Alarm will go off from Mon to Fri)
Due to system restrictions, weather info in morning reports may not be displayed correctly after device reboots.
"朝のレポートをオフにする"
Show background images for related alarms
Turn off repeating alarms between 04:00 and 10:00 AM to listen to the current weather report
"4:00から9:30の間にアラームをオフにすると、天気に関する情報を受け取ります"
Include weather info in the first alarm turned off between 4:00 and 10:00
天気情報を取得するにはタップ
ネットワークに接続して天気情報を取得する

<Data>In order to provide personalized services and include morning news into your alarms, Clock needs to connect to the internet. Before using Clock, you must also read and agree to our <a href=\"%1$s\">User Agreement</a> and <a href=\"%2$s\">Privacy Policy</a>. Agree?</Data>

To make MIUI smart alarms available, Clock needs to download audio files. Smart alarms contain audio features that allow including current weather info into the alarms. ≈20MB of your mobile data will be required for this download. Download now?
Clock needs to download audio files for MIUI smart alarms. ≈20MB of your mobile data will be required for this download. Download now?
Updated audio for MIUI smart alarms is available. ≈20MB of your mobile data will be required for this download. Download now?
Clock needs to download audio files for ambient noise timers. ≈20MB of your mobile data will be required for this download. Download now?
"追加の音声ファイルをダウンロードできませんでした"
"Couldn't download audio. Check your network settings and try again."
To make MIUI smart alarms available, Clock needs to download audio files. Smart alarms contain audio features that allow including current weather info into the alarms. Download now?
Clock needs to download audio files for MIUI smart alarms. Download now?
Updated audio for MIUI smart alarms is available. Download now?
Clock needs to download audio files for ambient noise timers. Download now?
Clock needs to connect to the internet to download audio. Check your network settings and try again.
"音声ファイルを正常にダウンロードしました"

"音声ファイルをダウンロード中…"
Updated audio for MIUI smart alarms was downloaded successfully. You can set MIUI smart alarms in the Clock settings.
Weather alarm selects different ringtones according to the current weather. Clock needs to download ≈30MB of audio to make it work. Download now?

<Data>Weather alarm selects different ringtones according to the current weather. Clock needs to connect to the internet to download ≈30MB of audio. Before using Clock, you must also read and agree to our <a href=\"%1$s\">User Agreement</a> and <a href=\"%2$s\">Privacy Policy</a>. Agree?</Data>

Weather alarm selects different ringtones according to the current weather. It also allows you to listen to the current weather info in the morning.
Weather alarm selects different ringtones according to the current weather.
Weather alarm now comes with background music and better voice announcements. Clock needs to download ≈30MB of audio to make it work. Download now?
Weather alarm now comes with background music and better voice announcements. You can create a new alarm to try this feature.
Nature alarm plays different sounds depending on the date. Clock needs to download ≈30MB of audio to make it work. Download now?

Nature alarm plays different sounds depending on the date. You can create a new alarm to try this feature.

アラームはありません
世界時計はありません
プライバシーポリシー
Show notifications before alarms go off
ストップウォッチを開始
Shutdown alarms will go off at least 10 minutes after you power off your device
"Alarm won't go off after the device is powered off"
"Alarm will go off if it's set for at least 10 minutes after you power off your device"
Sleep data provided by Mi Health
Most people need 7 to 9 hours of sleep per night
Switch to DND mode until you wake up
Start tracking your sleep to view stats
Turn on to start recording sleep data

Sleep tracking functionality is provided by Mi Health. Once turned on, Mi Health automatically records your sleep based on your phone usage, activity stats, as well as fall asleep and wake up time you set, showing you stats in the form of charts. To track sleep more accurately, allow Mi Health to autostart. All the related data will be stored locally on your device, which allows you to manage it easily.
Your stats will appear here after Mi Health analyzes enough data
Creating weekday alarms and setting customized ringtones

Sleep tracking functionality is provided by Mi Health. Update Mi Health to its latest version to access related features.
